name: Startup Ideation Workshop
details: A workshop focused on brainstorming innovative startup ideas, understanding market needs, and developing business models. Industry experts and mentors will guide participants.

name: Tech Prototype Showcase
details: An exhibition where budding entrepreneurs present their tech prototypes to investors, mentors, and industry leaders.

name: Entrepreneurship Bootcamp
details: A three-day intensive bootcamp covering business strategies, funding opportunities, and startup scaling techniques.

name: Pitch Your Idea
details: A competition where startups and students pitch their business ideas to a panel of investors and experts for funding and mentorship.

name: Innovation Hackathon
details: A 24-hour coding and innovation challenge where teams solve real-world problems using technology and creativity.

name: Webinar Invitation: The Story - Motivational Session by Successful Innovator
details:
The theme of the webinar: The Story - Motivational Session by a successful innovator.

Expert Speaker: Dr. Sanjiban Banerjee, Co-founder, and Director of AbGenics Lifesciences Private Ltd.

Date of Webinar: 16th December 2020 | Time: 11:00 AM

Link for the webinar: Join Here

This session will be conducted by Dr. Sanjiban Banerjee, Co-founder, and Director of AbGenics Lifesciences Private Ltd, a Pune-based biotech company working to develop antibody-based therapeutics for infectious diseases and cancer.

He will share his experience and lessons learned in his entrepreneurial journey in the search for novel antibacterial biologicals.

This is a great opportunity for students and young faculty members to understand the experiences and challenges faced by a successful entrepreneur. At the end of the session, participants will have the chance to directly interact with him to clear any doubts regarding opening a start-up company.

We eagerly await your participation in the Webinar.

Note: This mail is also being forwarded to our server support team and Dr. Anirban Sarkar to circulate it to all students of NIT Durgapur.
